학습 팁: 1) He was found innocent of the charges. 2) Children are often innocent and curious.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: 'innocent' 반의어? (A) guilty (B) pure → A, Q2: 전치사? innocent ___ charges → of, Q3: 명사형? → innocence

학습 팁: 1) She maintained her innocence. 2) The child's innocence was touching.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: innocence 품사? → 명사, Q2: 의미는? (A) 죄 (B) 무죄 → B, Q3: 반의어? → guilt

예문(난이도별 2~3개): commit a crime, commit to goals
학습 팁: 1) He committed a serious crime. 2) She committed to improving her skills.
교과/분야 태그: commit + crime, commit to -ing 구문 반드시 암기
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: commit의 주요 뜻? (A) 파괴 (B) 저지르다, 약속하다 → B, Q2: commit to 뒤 형태? → -ing, Q3: 명사형? → commitment

학습 팁: 1) His commitment to the project impressed everyone. 2) They made a long-term commitment.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: commitment 의미? → 헌신, Q2: collocation? → commitment to, Q3: 반의어? → indifference

학습 팁: 1) The food supply is adequate. 2) He gave an adequate answer.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: adequate 뜻? → 충분한, Q2: 반의어? → insufficient, Q3: 전치사? adequate ___ → for, to

예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) The dog became aggressive. 2) They adopted an aggressive marketing strategy.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: aggressive의 두 의미? → 공격적, 적극적, Q2: 명사형? → aggression, Q3: 반의어? → passive

핵심 개념 요약(한 문장): 다른 사람에게 쉽게 복종하거나 따르는 성향.
학습 팁: 1) He has a submissive nature. 2) The dog became submissive after training.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: submissive 반의어? → dominant, Q2: 전치사? submissive ___ → to, Q3: 명사형? → submission

학습 팁: 1) The country condemned the act of aggression. 2) The animal showed aggression.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: aggression 의미? → 공격성, Q2: 형용사형? → aggressive, Q3: 반의어? → peace

예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) He thrust the door open. 2) The rocket's thrust increased. 3) She thrust the letter into my hand.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: thrust의 의미? → 밀다, Q2: 반의어? → pull, Q3: 구동사? thrust ___ darkness → into

학습 팁: 1) His anger was apparent. 2) There is no apparent reason for the delay.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: apparent 의미? → 명백한, Q2: 부사형? → apparently, Q3: 반의어? → hidden
